cards.name: Albus Dumbledore
cards.description: If you have at least 4 Lessons in play, your Spell cards with a printed Power cost of 6 or more need 2 less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)

cards.name: Argus Filch
cards.description: You may use an Action to discard an Adventure from play (yours or your opponent's). (You don't get the reward.)

cards.name: Crabbe & Goyle
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard 2 cards from your hand to do 3 damage to your opponent.

description.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Adventure cards.
description.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 2 Adventure cards in his or her hand and discards them.
description.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.name: Dragon's Blood
cards.description: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 11 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Dumbledore's Watch
cards.description: If this card is in play before your turn, discard all cards (other than each player's starting Character) from play (including this card).

cards.name: End-of-Year Feast
cards.description: Put up to 4 Adventure cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Fang
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play. When you play this card, do 4 damage to your opponent.

description.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to play Location cards.
description.toSolve: Your opponent lets you search your deck. You may take up to 2 Location cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
description.reward: Your opponent may put a Lesson card from his or her hand into play.

cards.name: Galleon
cards.description: You can play only 1 Money card each turn. Before your turn, if this card is in play, discard it and your get 3 more Actions this turn.
